dct_title_s: General Map of the Northwest Territories
dct_alternative_sm: General map of the Northwest Territories and of the Province of Manitoba revised and corrected to 31st August 1894 / revised and published under the superintendence of J. Johnston, geographer.
dct_description_sm: 1 map on 3 sheets : col. ; 95 x 189 cm., each sheet 105 x 69 cm.
Relief shown by hachures and spot heights.
"Photo.-lith: and printed by the Sabiston Publishing Co., Montreal."

Includes electoral districts, township outlines, township projections, North West Mounted Police reserves and stations, Indian reserves, provincial and territorial capitals, post offices, outcrops of coal and lignite, railways, etc.
"Published by authority of the Hon. T. Mayne Daly, M.P., Minister of the Interior."
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
